english_translation: You walk alone under the row of trees.
When life wanders on the edge of impatience/anxiety.

kannada_original: ಮರೆ ಎಲ್ಲ ಸಹವಾಸ ಆ ಒಂಟಿ ಕ್ಷಣದಲ್ಲಿ
english_transliteration: Mare ella sahavāsa ā oṇṭi kṣaṇadalli
english_translation: Forget all company in that solitary moment.

kannada_original: ಅದುವೆ ನಿಜ ಇಳೆಯ ಸುಖ – ಮುದ್ದು ರಾಮ.
english_transliteration: Aduve nija iḷeya sukha – Muddu Rāma.
english_translation: That itself is the true happiness of the earth – Muddu Rama.
